cards.name: Advanced Threat Defense
cards.description: Multi-layered security system with reactive blocking
cards.flavor: When one shield falls, three more stand ready
cards.effect: Can be played as any Shield or Fortify card. Target infrastructure can't be compromised by reactive attack cards for 1 turn.

cards.name: Threat Intelligence Network
cards.flavor: Knowledge is power, and power is protection
cards.effect: Can be played as any card type. Look at attacker's hand and force them to discard 2 cards of your choice. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Emergency Response Team
cards.flavor: When everything goes wrong, we make it right
cards.effect: Restore ALL compromised infrastructure to secure state. Can only be played once per game.

cards.name: Security Automation Suite
cards.flavor: Why secure one system when you can secure them all?
cards.effect: After shielding or fortifying infrastructure, immediately make another infrastructure shielded.

cards.name: Defensive Coordination Protocol
cards.description: Coordinated defensive response across all systems
cards.flavor: Defense is stronger when we work together
cards.effect: Can be played as any Shield, Fortify, or Response card. After securing infrastructure, immediately secure another infrastructure without playing a card.

cards.name: Honeypot Network
cards.description: Decoy systems that detect and punish intrusions
cards.flavor: The sweetest traps catch the greediest flies
cards.effect: Can be played as any card type. For the next 2 rounds, whenever attacker plays an exploit card, they must discard 1 additional card.

cards.name: Incident Containment Protocol
cards.flavor: Stop the breach before it spreads
cards.effect: Can be played as a Response card. When played in response to attacker compromising infrastructure, immediately restore it to secure state and shield it.
